languages.text: "Я дарую жизнь тебе и Глейто — уходи и больше никогда не появляйся в моем протекторате".
"I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."
languages.original_text: "Я дарую жизнь тебе и Глейто — уходи и больше никогда не появляйся в моем протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave and never appear within the protectorate's borders again."
"I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave and never appear within the protectorate's borders again."
"I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."
"I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."
"I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."
"I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

languages.text: "Ich schenke Euch und Glaito das Leben. Geht und lasst Euch in den Grenzen des Protektorat nie mehr blicken."
languages.original_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schenke Euch und Glaito das Leben. Geht und lasst Euch in den Grenzen des Protektorat nie mehr blicken."

languages.text: « Je vous accorde la vie sauve, à vous et à Glaito. Partez et ne remettez plus jamais les pieds dans mon protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous accorde la vie sauve, à vous et à Glaito. Partez et ne remettez plus jamais les pieds dans mon protectorat. »

languages.text: “我在此放过你和格雷托。离开这里，再也不要出现在我的王朝境内了。”
languages.original_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

traits.locale_text: “我在此放过你和格雷托。离开这里，再也不要出现在我的王朝境内了。”

languages.text: «Le ofrezco su vida y la de Glaito. Márchese y no vuelve a dejarse ver en mi protectorado nunca más».
languages.original_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

traits.locale_text: «Le ofrezco su vida y la de Glaito. Márchese y no vuelve a dejarse ver en mi protectorado nunca más».

languages.text: 「君とグライトの命だけは許してやる。ここを立ち去り、二度と保護領の境界線内に姿を現すな」
languages.original_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

traits.locale_text: 「君とグライトの命だけは許してやる。ここを立ち去り、二度と保護領の境界線内に姿を現すな」

languages.text: "Senin ve Glatio'nun canını bağışlıyorum. Gidebilirsiniz. Ancak protektora sınırlarının yakınından geçtiğinizi görmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I offer you and Glaito your lives. Leave, and never show yourself within the protectorate's borders again."

traits.locale_text: "Senin ve Glatio'nun canını bağışlıyorum. Gidebilirsiniz. Ancak protektora sınırlarının yakınından geçtiğinizi görmeyeceğim."
